00055 #define MAX_DEVICE_COUNT 16
00056 #define MAX_TARGET_COUNT 16

00058 static nfc_device *pnd;

00060 static void
00061 print_usage(const char *argv[])
00062 {
00063   printf("Usage: %s [OPTIONS]\n", argv[0]);
00064   printf("Options:\n");
00065   printf("\t-h\tPrint this help message.\n");
00066   printf("\t-v\tSet verbose display.\n");
00067   printf("\t-i\tAllow intrusive scan.\n");
00068 }

00070 int
00071 main(int argc, const char *argv[])
00072 {
00073   const char *acLibnfcVersion;
00074   size_t  i;
00075   bool verbose = false;
00076 
00077   nfc_context *context;
00078 
00079   // Get commandline options
00080   for (int arg = 1; arg < argc; arg++) {
00081     if (0 == strcmp(argv[arg], "-h")) {
00082       print_usage(argv);
00083       exit(EXIT_SUCCESS);
00084     } else if (0 == strcmp(argv[arg], "-v")) {
00085       verbose = true;
00086     } else if (0 == strcmp(argv[arg], "-i")) {
00087       // This has to be done before the call to nfc_init()
00088       setenv("LIBNFC_INTRUSIVE_SCAN", "yes", 1);
00089     } else {
00090       ERR("%s is not supported option.", argv[arg]);
00091       print_usage(argv);
00092       exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00093     }
00094   }
00095 
00096   nfc_init(&context);
00097   if (context == NULL) {
00098     ERR("Unable to init libnfc (malloc)\n");
00099     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00100   }
00101 
00102   // Display libnfc version
00103   acLibnfcVersion = nfc_version();
00104   printf("%s uses libnfc %s\n", argv[0], acLibnfcVersion);
00105 
00106   nfc_connstring connstrings[MAX_DEVICE_COUNT];
00107   size_t szDeviceFound = nfc_list_devices(context, connstrings, MAX_DEVICE_COUNT);
00108 
00109   if (szDeviceFound == 0) {
00110     printf("No NFC device found.\n");
00111     nfc_exit(context);
00112     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00113   }
00114 
00115   printf("%d NFC device(s) found:\n", (int)szDeviceFound);
00116   char *strinfo = NULL;
00117   for (i = 0; i < szDeviceFound; i++) {
00118     pnd = nfc_open(context, connstrings[i]);
00119     if (pnd != NULL) {
00120       printf("- %s:\n    %s\n", nfc_device_get_name(pnd), nfc_device_get_connstring(pnd));
00121       if (verbose) {
00122         if (nfc_device_get_information_about(pnd, &strinfo) >= 0) {
00123           printf("%s", strinfo);
00124           nfc_free(strinfo);
00125         }
00126       }
00127       nfc_close(pnd);
00128     } else {
00129       printf("nfc_open failed for %s\n", connstrings[i]);
00130     }
00131   }
00132   nfc_exit(context);
00133   exit(EXIT_SUCCESS);
00134 }
